Class SimulatedGameTreePlayer

java.lang.Object
islands.model.player.SimulatedPlayer
islands.model.player.SimulatedGameTreePlayer
public abstract class SimulatedGameTreePlayer extends SimulatedPlayer
A simulated player that uses a game tree to select moves.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    SimulatedGameTreePlayer()
    Constructs a simulated game tree player.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulatedGameTreePlayer

      public SimulatedGameTreePlayer()
      Constructs a simulated game tree player.

  • Method Details

    • getMyMove

      public abstract Move getMyMove(GameModel model, int depth, TileColor tileColor)
      Provides the play expected to lead to the result with the highest value (as determined by getValue(GameModel, TileColor) for the current player. This usually simulates the opposing player by calling getOpponentValue(GameModel, int, TileColor).
      Parameters:
      model - the current game state
      depth - the maximum number of moves ahead to search
      tileColor - the color of the player whose score we want to maximize
      Returns:
      the results of making the best play to each board position

    • getOpponentValue

      public abstract double getOpponentValue(GameModel model, int depth, TileColor tileColor)
      Gives the expected value of the game state assuming the opponent gets to choose the next move. This usually simulates the maximizing player by calling getMyMove(GameModel, int, TileColor).
      Parameters:
      model - the current game state
      depth - the maximum number of moves ahead to search
      tileColor - the color of the player whose score we want to maximize
      Returns:
      the expected value of the model for the maximizing player

    • getValue

      public double getValue(GameModel model, TileColor tileColor)
      Estimates the value of the provided game model to the specified player.
      Parameters:
      model - the model
      tileColor - the player color
      Returns:
      the estimated or actual value of the model

    • getLegalPositions

      protected List<RowColPair> getLegalPositions(GameModel model)
      Gets positions that moves can be played on (i.e., not covered by a tile).
      Parameters:
      model - the model
      Returns:
      legal positions
